title: Death Recap is a Joke and it's an Embarrassment That it Has Been for This Long

embed.description: Post with 0 views. Shared by Fiiji.

body: This isn't a rare thing. Zero times out of ten I am killed by only 3 abilities for one character. There are a million tiny things that do damage now. Even past that, the numbers I am given don't even come close to adding up. How long has it been broken? Riot if you aren't going to tune down damage and if you aren't doing to change game pacing at least fix the one thing that tells me why I just got one shot.
